reviewText: I would give this DVD 10 stars if they were available.  Having taken several workshops from David, I can say that he is one of the best artists as well as instructors I've had the pleasure to take from.  He is down-to-earth, enthusiastic about painting, challenging, very good at getting the feel and essence of a scene without defining every little item the eye can see.  I find him amazing.  If you are into growing as a watercolor artist, David is one of the best out there to move you from one level to the next.  I am sorry that the person who gave this DVD a one-star couldn't appreciate the kind of art that David produces.  It doesn't matter.  There is a world full of people who do, as exemplified by the many many awards he has received from around the world, including China.  'nough said!
Excellent DVD. David is a true master at his craft.
Purchased the DVD for our Watercolor Guild and it is a big hit.
I was looking for help in finding the light.  David doesn't  really give this and his work is not impressive.  My 9 year old  paints better than this.  Don't waste your money
